Images advertising: Starbucks Dreamer Day" circulated on social media, indicating that the coffee chain planned to give a deep discount to undocumented immigrants on 11 August 2017.
Starbucks responded to shares of the ima: denying any such promotion existed and asking Twitter users about the origins of the rumor.
The account that initially tweeted about: MariaChavez88, was created on or around 3 August 2017, suggesting it was likely created to spread the rumor.
Pranksters continued to push the rumor e: leading to a second rumor that the first one was a ruse to lure undocumented immigrants to central locations on a specific date.
